p: The adjusted probability of death was then plotted for each ETC with the respective confidence bands to determine how mortality varied as a function of viral load in the two ETCs. All variables except LVL and ETC were chosen to be equal to their mean values. The width of the confidence bands for Lakka and Goderich was estimated by Payton et al. [ 27] approximate method. This procedure is designed to evaluate, with a given significance level, whether two confidence intervals overlap (Supporting information, S5).
